alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHWESTERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 300 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albany, or 10 miles southwest of Hammond, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Albany, Springfield, and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 25 and 41. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 25 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
